feed.title: Azure Serverless Indiders
feed.subtitle: Serverless Indiders est un Hub de documentation pour tout apprndre sur le monde du Serverless Azure

entry.title: Processing 100K events per second on Azure Functions

link.title: Processing 100K events per second on Azure Functions

entry.content: Today I want to talk about running high scale Event Hub/IOT Hub workloads on Azure Functions and some key points to be aware of in order to maximize the performance you get from the platform
entry.summary: Today I want to talk about running high scale Event Hub/IOT Hub workloads on Azure Functions and some key points to be aware of in order to maximize the performance you get from the platform

entry.title: Stellar Social Media Banner Pack
entry.content: 12 fully editable banner designs, each in 5 different sizes optimized for Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest and Blog adds and posts! Very easy to edit, with 100 stock photos included, this pack is an awesome way to create stunning and eye catching adds and posts.
entry.summary: 12 fully editable banner designs, each in 5 different sizes optimized for Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest and Blog adds and posts! Very easy to edit, with 100 stock photos included, this pack is an awesome way to create stunning and eye catching adds and posts.

entry.title: Intro UI Kit
entry.content: Intro is the modern and minimalistic UI Kit that will help you simplify your work. Perfect for creating websites of agencies, studios and creative people around the world.

entry.title: Maltese
entry.content: Inside you’ll find 10 easy to edit, fully customisable Moodboard Templates, created in PHOTOSHOP and optimised in 2 different sizes for the best presentation on Pinterest, Instagram and not only.

entry.title: Material Mobile UI Kit
entry.content: Matta - Material Design Mobile UI Kit is the superb library of app Templates and UI elements combined into high-quality source files for Sketch. All you need for quick prototype, design and develop any Material Design mobile app.

entry.title: Grace UI Kit
entry.content: Grace is the modern and minimalistic UI Kit that will help you simplify your work. Includes 7 popular categories: Headers, Ecommerce, Blog/Magazine, Media, Forms, Navigation and Styleguide. All components are flexible and easy to use in Scetch & Photoshop.
entry.summary: Grace is the modern and minimalistic UI Kit that will help you simplify your work. Includes 7 popular categories: Headers, Ecommerce, Blog/Magazine, Media, Forms, Navigation and Styleguide. All components are flexible and easy to use in Scetch & Photoshop.
